participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outdoorsy, loves nature and exploring new heights.
participant_1.background: I like to go hiking in the spring. My favorite activity is rock climbing. I've a black lab named Trooper. I live in Colorado. I'm a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and somewhat eccentric, with a love for unique experiences.
participant_2.background: I married a super model from Italy. I've zero family that I'm close to. My name is George. I'm a bee farmer. My favorite food is papaya.
